citation.title: Better Doctors, Better Patients, Better Decisions

q&a.title: Is more than 30% of US healthcare spending waste?
q&a.summary: National healthcare spending in the USA consumes more than 18% of GDP and is growing rapidly. Europeans criticise the expense and relatively poor quality of the US system (for example, see this question: Is the US Newborn Mortality Rate higher than 40 Coun

q&a.summary:
